system.description:
You learn the Disrupting Thoughts and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.4oruofw2q7gso9hq]{Minor Illusion} cantrips. They count as warlock cantrips for you, but they don't count against your number of cantrips known.
Additionally, you gain proficiency in the Sleight of Hand skill, or an expertise die if you were already proficient.
system.prerequisite: Level 1 Warlock Agent of the Magus
